title: Remove landing page images and admin panel; use a single fixed Google Drive APK download link

requirements.text: Remove the in-UI Admin Panel from the application so end users cannot see or interact with any configuration UI.

quotes: remove all the images and mockups and even admin panel

acceptanceCriteria: The AdminPanel component is not rendered anywhere in the app UI (including on the LandingPage).
No floating panel / config editor appears on any viewport size.
Any routes/entry points that previously showed the admin panel no longer do so.

requirements.text: Update all APK download actions to use the single fixed Google Drive URL: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hFHZKQIsXB-80s6kiqhzfsKxi3s24qA7/view?usp=drive_link

quotes: just use this link for downloading apk "https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hFHZKQIsXB-80s6kiqhzfsKxi3s24qA7/view?usp=drive_link"

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the primary CTA in the Hero section triggers a download/navigation using the exact Google Drive URL provided.
Clicking the primary CTA in the Final CTA section triggers a download/navigation using the exact Google Drive URL provided.
There are no remaining code paths that read the APK download URL from localStorage or an admin-edited config at runtime.

requirements.text: Remove all images and mockups from the landing page UI so the page renders with no image assets (no phone mockups, no showcase images, no UI screenshots). Keep the typography-driven, ultra-minimal black aesthetic intact.

quotes: remove all the images and mockups

acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section does not render any floating mockup/phone images.
The Psychological Hit section does not render any revealed UI image/screenshot.
The What It Does section does not render any images for its blocks.
No elements (or CSS background images) are used for product mockups/screenshots anywhere on the landing page.

requirements.text: Update any customization documentation and configuration modules to reflect the new fixed-link, no-images behavior (remove references to replacing images and using the Admin Panel / localStorage editing). All documentation must be in English and reference the exact Google Drive URL as the APK link.

quotes: remove all the images and mockups and even admin panel just use this link for downloading apk

acceptanceCriteria: Documentation no longer instructs users to use the Admin Panel to edit links/images.
Documentation no longer instructs users to add/replace landing page images for mockups/showcase blocks.
Documentation clearly states the APK download link is fixed to the provided Google Drive URL and indicates where it is defined in code.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend remains single-actor; do not introduce additional backend services (no backend changes expected for this request).
nonGoals: Do not add new images, mockups, or screenshot assets.
Do not add a replacement admin/settings screen for editing links or images.
Do not implement backend-stored configuration; the APK link must remain a fixed constant in the frontend codebase.
